title: The Jackson years: towards civil war
creator_credit: Dennis Azzarella and Learning Corporation of America
brief_description: Concentrates on Andrew Jackson’s first four year term. Covers his quarrel with the National Banks; the treaties with the Cherokees which saw the setting-up of reservasions west of the Mississippi; his resolution of the South Carolina dispute with the Federal Government; and the gagging of John Q Adams on the subject of slavery.
